animation.title: Animation
animation.description: An animation is a set of keyframes that can be applied to an element.

variables.title: Variable Definition
variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

control.title: Element
control.description: An element is a control that can be added to a screen. It can be a button, a label, an image, etc.

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [element_name]@[namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Variable reference
anyOf.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

C.title: Animation Reset Name
C.description: The name of the animation that will be reset.

F.title: Variable
F.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

E.title: Destroy At End
E.description: If true, the element will be destroyed at the end of the animation.

G.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
G.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

BB.title: End Event
BB.description: The event that will be triggered when the animation ends.

BE.title: Frame Count
BE.description: The number of frames in the animation.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BG.title: From
BG.description: The starting point of the animation.

BI.title: Initial UV
BI.description: The initial UV of the animation.

BJ.title: Next
BJ.description: The name of the next element.

CA.title: Play Event
CA.description: The event that will be played.

CC.title: Reversible
CC.description: If true, the animation will be reversible.

CD.title: Scale From Starting Alpha
CD.description: If true, the animation will scale from the starting alpha.

CE.title: To
CE.description: The ending point of the animation.

CH.title: Allow Clipping
CH.description: If true, the element will allow clipping.

CI.title: Allow Scroll Even When Content Fits
CI.description: If true, the element will allow scrolling even when the content fits.

CJ.title: Always Handle Pointer
CJ.description: If true, the element will always handle the pointer.

DA.title: Always Handle Scrolling
DA.description: If true, the element will always handle scrolling.

DB.title: Always Listen To Input
DB.description: If true, the element will always listen to input.

DC.title: Always Rotate
DC.description: If true, the element will always rotate.

DE.title: Anchor
DE.description: An anchor is a reference to an element in the UI.

DD.title: Anchor From
DD.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DF.title: Anchor To
DF.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

DG.title: Animations
DG.description: The animations that are contained within this element.

DH.title: Background Control
DH.description: The control that will be used for the background.

DI.title: Background Hover Control
DI.description: The control that will be used for the background when hovered.

DJ.title: Backup Font Type
DJ.description: The type of the backup font.

EA.title: Bilinear
EA.description: If true, the element will use bilinear filtering.

EB.title: Bindings
EB.description: The bindings that are contained within this element.

binding_collection_name.title: Binding Collection Name
binding_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_collection_prefix.title: Binding Collection Prefix
binding_collection_prefix.description: The prefix of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_condition.title: Binding Condition
binding_condition.description: The condition that must be met for the binding to be applied.

binding_name.title: Binding Name
binding_name.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_name_override.title: Binding Name Override
binding_name_override.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the binding will be ignored.

resolve_sibling_scope.title: Resolve Sibling Scope
resolve_sibling_scope.description: If true, the binding will resolve sibling scope.

source_control_name.title: Source Control Name
source_control_name.description: The name of the control that the binding is in.

source_property_name.title: Source Property Name
source_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

target_property_name.title: Target Property Name
target_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

EC.title: Button Mappings
EC.description: The button mappings that are contained within this element.

ED.title: Cache Screen
ED.description: If true, the screen will be cached.

EE.title: Checked Control
EE.description: The control that will be checked.

EF.title: Checked Hover Control
EF.description: The control that will be checked when hovered.

EG.title: Checked Locked Control
EG.description: The control that will be checked when locked.

EH.title: Checked Locked Hover Control
EH.description: The control that will be checked when locked and hovered.

EI.title: Clip Direction
EI.description: The direction that the element will be clipped in.

EJ.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
EJ.description: If true, the element will be clipped pixel perfect.

FA.title: Clips Children
FA.description: If true, the element will clip its children.

FB.title: Close On Player Hurt
FB.description: If true, the element will close when the player is hurt.

FC.title: Collection Index
FC.description: The index of the collection that the element is in.

FD.title: Collection Name
FD.description: The name of the collection that the element is in.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

FE.title: Color
FE.description: The color of the text. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

FG.title: Consume Hover Events
FG.description: If true, the element will consume hover events.

FH.title: Contained
FH.description: If true, the element will be contained.

FJ.title: Controls
FJ.description: The controls that are contained within this element.

GA.title: Default Control
GA.description: The default control that will be focused.

GB.title: Default Focus Precedence
GB.description: The default focus precedence of the element.

GC.title: Draggable
GC.description: If true, the element will be draggable.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

GD.title: Dropdown Area
GD.description: The area that the dropdown will be in.

GF.title: Dropdown Content Control
GF.description: The control that will be used for the dropdown content.

GH.title: Enable Directional Toggling
GH.description: If true, the element will enable directional toggling.

GI.title: Enable Profanity Filter
GI.description: If true, the element will enable the profanity filter.

GJ.title: Enabled Newline
GJ.description: If true, the element will be enabled when a new line is created.

HA.title: Enabled
HA.description: If true, the element will be enabled.

HB_variables.title: Variable Definition
HB_variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

HB.title: Factory
HB.description: The factory that will be used to create the element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The name of the control that will be created by the factory.

factory_variables.title: Factory Variables
factory_variables.description: The variables that will be used by the factory.

HC.title: Fill
HC.description: If true, the element will fill the screen.

HH.title: Focus Container
HH.description: If true, the element will be a focus container.

HI.title: Focus Enabled
HI.description: If true, the element will be focus enabled.

HJ.title: Focus Identifier
HJ.description: The identifier of the element that will be focused.

IA.title: Focus Magnet Enabled
IA.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.

IC.title: Navigation Mode
IC.description: The navigation mode of the UI.

IB.title: Focus Navigation Mode Down
IB.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating down.

ID.title: Focus Navigation Mode Left
ID.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating left.

IE.title: Focus Navigation Mode Right
IE.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating right.

IF.title: Focus Navigation Mode Up
IF.description: The focus navigation mode that will be used when navigating up.

IG.title: Focus Wrap Enabled
IG.description: If true, the element will be focus wrap enabled.

IH.title: Font Scale Factor
IH.description: The scale factor of the font.

JA.title: Force Render Below
JA.description: If true, the element will be rendered below the screen.

JB.title: Force Texture Reload
JB.description: If true, the texture will be reloaded.

JC.title: Grid Dimension Binding
JC.description: The binding that will be used for the grid dimension.

JE.title: Grid Item Template
JE.description: The template that will be used for the grid item.

JG.title: Grid Rescaling Type
JG.description: The type of the grid rescaling.

JH.title: Handle Deselect
JH.description: If true, the element will handle deselect.

JI.title: Handle Select
JI.description: If true, the element will handle select.

JJ.title: Hide Hyphen
JJ.description: If true, the element will hide the hyphen.

BAA.title: Hover Control
BAA.description: The control that will be hovered.

BAB.title: Hover Enabled
BAB.description: If true, the element will be hover enabled.

BAC.title: Ignored
BAC.description: If true, the element will be ignored.

BAD.title: Images
BAD.description: The images that are contained within this element.

BAE.title: Indent Control
BAE.description: The control that will be indented.

BAF.title: Inherit Max Sibling Height
BAF.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum height of its siblings.

BAG.title: Inherit Max Sibling Width
BAG.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum width of its siblings.

BAH.title: Is Modal
BAH.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BAI.title: Is Showing Menu
BAI.description: If true, the element will be showing the menu.

BAJ.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
BAJ.description: If true, the element will jump to the bottom when updated.

BBA.title: Keep Ratio
BBA.description: If true, the element will keep its ratio.

BBB.title: Layer
BBB.description: The layer that the element will be rendered in. Higher layers are rendered on top of lower layers.

BBC.title: Localize
BBC.description: If true, the element will be localized.

BBD.title: Locked Control
BBD.description: The control that will be locked.

BBE.title: Low Frequency Rendering
BBE.description: If true, the element will be rendered at a lower frequency.

BBF.title: Max Length
BBF.description: The maximum length of the text. If the text is longer than this, it will be truncated.

oneOf.description: A size with width and height.

BBG.title: Max Size
BBG.description: The maximum size of the element.

BBI.title: Maximum Grid Items
BBI.description: The maximum number of grid items.

BBJ.title: Min Size
BBJ.description: The minimum size of the element.

BCA.title: Modal
BCA.description: If true, the element will be modal.

BCB.title: Offset
BCB.description: The offset of the element from the anchor point. horizontal by vertical.

BCD.title: Place Holder Control
BCD.description: The control that will be used for the place holder.

BCE.title: Pressed Control
BCE.description: The control that will be pressed.

BCF.title: Prevent Touch Input
BCF.description: If true, touch input will be prevented from passing through this element.

BCG.title: Progress Control
BCG.description: The control that will be used for the progress.

BCH.title: Progress Hover Control
BCH.description: The control that will be used for the progress when hovered.

BCI.title: Property Bag
BCI.description: The property bag that will be used by the element.

BDA.title: Radio Toggle Group
BDA.description: The radio toggle group that the element is in.

BDB.title: Render Game Behind
BDB.description: If true, the game will be rendered behind the element.

BDC.title: Render Only When Topmost
BDC.description: If true, the element will only be rendered when it is the topmost element.

BDD.title: Renderer
BDD.description: The renderer that will be used by the element.

BDE.title: Reset Event
BDE.description: The event that will be reset.

BDF.title: Reset On Focus Lost
BDF.description: If true, the element will be reset when focus is lost.

BDG.title: Rotate Speed
BDG.description: The speed that the element will rotate at.

BDH.title: Screen Draws Last
BDH.description: If true, the screen will be drawn last.

BDI.title: Screen Not Flushable
BDI.description: If true, the screen will not be flushed when the element is added.

BDJ.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
BDJ.description: The panel that will be used for the scroll box and track.

BEA.title: Scroll Content
BEA.description: The content that will be scrolled.

BEB.title: Scroll Speed
BEB.description: The speed that the element will scroll at.

BEC.title: Scroll View Port
BEC.description: The view port that the element will be scrolled in.

BEE.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
BEE.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar touch.

BEF.title: Scrollbar Track Button
BEF.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar track.

BEH.title: Send Telemetry
BEH.description: If true, the element will send telemetry.

BEI.title: Shadow
BEI.description: If true, the text will have a shadow.

BEJ.title: Should Steal Mouse
BEJ.description: If true, the element will steal the mouse.

BFB.title: Slider Box Control
BFB.description: The control that will be used for the slider box.

BFC.title: Slider Collection Name
BFC.description: The name of the collection that the slider is in.

BFD.title: Slider Deselected Button
BFD.description: The button that will be used for the slider deselected.

BFG.title: Slider Select On Hover
BFG.description: If true, the slider will select on hover.

BFH.title: Slider Selected Button
BFH.description: The button that will be used for the slider selected.

BFI.title: Slider Small Decrease Button
BFI.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BFJ.title: Slider Small Increase Button
BFJ.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

BGB.title: Slider Track Button
BGB.description: The button that will be used for the slider track.

BGG.title: Text Box Name
BGG.description: The name of the text box.

BGH.title: Text Control
BGH.description: The control that will be used for the text.

BGI.title: Text Edit Box Grid Collection Name
BGI.description: The name of the collection that the text edit box grid is in.

BHC.title: Texture File System
BHC.description: The file system that the texture is in.

BHE.title: Tiled
BHE.description: If true, the texture will be tiled.

BHF.title: Toggle Default State
BHF.description: The default state of the toggle.

BHG.title: Toggle Grid Collection Name
BHG.description: The name of the collection that the toggle grid is in.

BHH.title: Toggle Group Default Selected
BHH.description: The default selected toggle of the toggle group.

BHI.title: Toggle Group Forced Index
BHI.description: The forced index of the toggle group.

BIA.title: Toggle Off Button
BIA.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BIB.title: Toggle On Button
BIB.description: The button that will toggle the element.

BIC.title: Touch Mode
BIC.description: The touch mode of the element.

BID.title: TTS Control Header
BID.description: The header of the TTS control.

BIE.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
BIE.description: The priority of the TTS control type order.

BIG.title: TTS Ignore Subsections
BIG.description: If true, the element will ignore subsections.

BIH.title: TTS Index Priority
BIH.description: The priority of the TTS index.

BII.title: TTS Inherit Siblings
BII.description: If true, the element will inherit its siblings.

BJA.title: TTS Override Control Value
BJA.description: If true, the TTS will override the control value.

BJB.title: TTS Section Header
BJB.description: The header of the TTS section.

BJC.title: TTS Toggle Off
BJC.description: If true, the TTS will toggle off.

BJD.title: TTS Toggle On
BJD.description: If true, the TTS will toggle on.

BJE.title: TTS Value Changed
BJE.description: If true, the TTS value will change.

BJF.title: TTS Value Order Priority
BJF.description: The priority of the TTS value order.

BJI.title: Unchecked Control
BJI.description: The control that will be unchecked.

BJJ.title: Unchecked Hover Control
BJJ.description: The control that will be unchecked when hovered.

CAA.title: Unchecked Locked Control
CAA.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked.

CAB.title: Unchecked Locked Hover Control
CAB.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked and hovered.

CAC.title: Use Anchored Offset
CAC.description: If true, the element will use the anchored offset.

CAD.title: Use Last Focus
CAD.description: If true, the element will use the last focus.

CAE_variables.title: Variable Definition
CAE_variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

CAE.title: Variables
CAE.description: The variables that are contained within this element.

CAF.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
CAF.description: The control that will be used for the virtual keyboard buffer.

CAG.title: Visible
CAG.description: If true, the element will be visible.

CAH.title: Zip Folder
CAH.description: The folder that the element will be zipped into.

CAI.title: Control IDs
CAI.description: The IDs of the controls that will be created by the factory.
